subject: College Athletics
Football
lead_paragraph: Two more Florida players will miss the season after tearing their anterior cruciate ligaments. Linebacker Brendan Beal, a freshman, was injured Monday; offensive lineman Jim Barrie, a sophomore, on Saturday. Tight end Cornelius Ingram, a senior, was injured last week. Dorian Munroe, a redshirt junior and a projected starter at safety, and John Curtis, a senior safety, were hurt in July.
